tellCancellingAction(String) - Static method in class trashday.ui.responses.ResponsesYesNo
When we get a No from the user that is canceling an action, we use this standard, verbal "Cancelled" from Alexa without any associated Card.

tellYesNoMisunderstood() - Static method in class trashday.ui.responses.ResponsesYesNo
When we get a Yes/No from the user but don't have any idea why, respond with a verbal "Sorry" from Alexa without any associated Card.
tellYesNoProblem(String) - Static method in class trashday.ui.responses.ResponsesYesNo
When we get an expected Yes/No from the user but we've somehow lost track of how the application should respond due to a code problem, then respond with a verbal "Oops" from Alexa without any associated Card.

translateFromAlexaSpeak(String) - Static method in class trashday.ui.requests.SlotTimeZone
Since time zone information contains abbreviations, special characters, numbers and computer-specific terms, we use this function to accept speech from Alexa and try to convert it to a good java time zone name.
translateToAlexaSpeak(String) - Static method in class trashday.ui.requests.SlotTimeZone
Translate a single java time zone ID to a textual representation suitable for someone to say to Alexa.
translateToAlexaSpeakSingleForm(String) - Static method in class trashday.ui.requests.SlotTimeZone
From a given time zone name, generates a textual representation suitable for someone to say to Alexa.
trashday - package trashday
Provides the core application logic of the Alexa skill called "Trash Day".
trashday.model - package trashday.model
Implements the Schedule object that stores the user's weekly pickup schedule.
trashday.storage - package trashday.storage
Provides the classes necessary to store user information in the Alexa session and Amazon Dynamo DB.
trashday.ui - package trashday.ui
Organizes a variety of functions to handle the Alexa voice and card user interface.
trashday.ui.requests - package trashday.ui.requests
Organizes all the functions that interpret voice requests from the user.
trashday.ui.responses - package trashday.ui.responses
Organizes all the functions that provide voice responses to the user.
trashday.ui.speechAssets - package trashday.ui.speechAssets
Provides the intent schema and sample utterances required to implement the Alexa voice user interface.
trashday.ui.speechAssets.customSlotTypes - package trashday.ui.speechAssets.customSlotTypes
Provides expected words for the Custom Slot Types in the voice user interface.
